# dots [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/dots.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/dots)

> Truncate string


## Install

```
$ npm install --save dots
```


## Usage

```js
const dots = require('dots');

dots('unicorn', 4);
//=> 'uni…'
```
